item.title: About me
item.description:
EDUCATION

  • Ph.D. in Linguistics (2009-2013) | Hong Kong Baptist University – advised by Dr. Huang Yue Yuan and Dr. Yang Suying
    • Exchange Ph.D. student (2011.10-2012.01) | University of Vienna - advised by Prof. Christiane Dalton-Puffer
  • M.A. in Linguistics (2003-2006) | Anhui University - advised by Prof. Zhu Xiaomei
  • B.A. in English Language and Literature (1999-2003) | Anhui University - advised by Prof. Tian Debei

WORK EXPERIENCE

  • Associate Professor, Anhui University | School of Foreign Studies
  • Visiting Scholar, University of Connecticut | Department of Psychological Sciences -Advised by Prof. Gerry Altmann at his Psycholinguistics Lab
  • Fulbright FLTA, Ramapo College of New Jersey | School of Humanities and Global Studies
  • Lecturer, Hong Kong Baptist University | Language Center
  • Research Assistant, Hong Kong Baptist University | Language Center & Department of English Language and Literature

RESEARCH INTERESTS
